publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-739.3 Robin Harper: The Environment—As an amendment to motion (S3M-739) in the name of Michael Russell, insert at end "also recognises the need for government to support our strong and enduring artistic tradition of challenging the comfortable assumptions of the majority in Scotland and that we should encourage those who exercise their talents to excite, surprise, irritate, expose, lampoon, question and challenge our perceptions, and further notes that Scotland’s extraordinary natural resources and built heritage are all under threat from climate change unless extensive and immediate action is taken." Supported by: Patrick Harvie* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
